response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our latest flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance the operations and profitability of your business. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I am confident it will be a game-changer for you.

After careful consideration of its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a purchase price of $950,000 for this product. This figure encapsulates the investment's potential return on your business, making it an attractive proposition.

Please let me know if this offer aligns with your expectations and budget. I am here to answer any questions you might have and discuss how this product can be seamlessly integrated into your existing processes.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
